html:
Mathematics 2

In Mathematics 2, we explore further some topics introduced in Mathematics 1 and we study some more applications to the social sciences, particularly economics. In particular, we investigate further the applications of differentiation and integration, and functions of several variables: we shall see some new applications and also some new techniques.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Used the concepts, terminology, methods and conventions covered in the half course to solve mathematical problems in this subject

+  The ability to solve unseen mathematical problems involving understanding of these concepts and application of these methods

+  Seen how mathematical techniques can be used to solve problems in economics and related subjects

Module Content:
